website_summaries.verdict: A standard, middle-of-the-pack selection of Nespresso pods that represent the coffee varieties very well.
pros: Packs in a variety of medium-to-dark roast coffees ranging in intensity from 5 to 10
cons: As a variety pack, there’s little choice in the flavors you’ll get

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso is Bestpresso
customer_reviews.text: I tried to quit you, Nespresso. I tried cheaper alternatives, I really did. I told myself you were too expensive for me. But your own capsules are what made me buy a nespresso machine in the first place, and it turns out that nothing else comes close. You're too smooth, too rich, too perfect for me to give up. I just can't quit you. I'm done trying out every other brand on the market. From now on, it's just you and me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brazalovich

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE! LISTEN TO ALL OF THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other negative reviews! 3 of the 6 Nespresso boxes showed up smashed when the amazon box it was packaged in looked brand new. About half the pods are useless in the smashed boxes. Tried several with even 'smaller' dents and the Nespresso Machine will not work properly. LISTEN TO EVERYONE AND DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cups came crushed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. It arrived with crushed cups throughout. I was so excited as I just bought the machine and cups from Amazon and the quality from Amazon cups is extremely poor!
customer_reviews.author: B. Blom

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money - Pods Bent/Crushed and More Expensive Than from Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: Ten (20%!) of the pods came slightly to mostly crushed. One got stuck in our office machine requiring a repair at Nespresso. Also have since realized that the pods are the same price (or cheaper) directly from Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Broken pods in every order
customer_reviews.text: We really love Nespresso. We order Nespresso pods every month. And there was not a single time without a few broken pods. Each time! This month I counted 5!!!! Broken Roma pods, that I paid for them but couldn't use. I give up. I think it might be a system.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: If you want THE best taste from your Nespresso machine, these are a MUST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the difference in taste between these OEM capsules & 3rd party capsules. As many other reviewers have noted, the 3rd party capsules (and I've tried 5 different 3rd party brands now) are weak in taste & flavor. I have the DeLonghi Lattissima Pro machine & with an OEM Nespresso ristretto capsule, the latte & cappuccino are just magnificent. With the 3rd party capsules, they're both mediocre...at best. PROS: The best flavors & taste. Wide choice of coffee types. CONS: VERY expensive compared to other types/brands of capsules or pods.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY L GRILLO

customer_reviews.title: What! Damage on EVERY capsule!
customer_reviews.text: How could it happen? Got very bad quality batches this time. EVERY capsule got damaged. It's like someone had squeezed each capsule before they put them in the box. (See attached photo) :-(
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Wen

customer_reviews.title: The worst one terrible taste plus package came
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy again from them!!! The worst one terrible taste plus package came damaged
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Barista Master in Press of Button
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso hit one outta the park. This variety pack provides a solid offering to put your taste buds in the espresso zone. Ok, some people have crushed unit issues...I have never had 1 issue. Even if I did, the product is to good to let a shipper pull down a superior product. I am not a drip coffee drone guy, I want top quality taste and fantastic aroma which is delivered. I cant say enough about this product from the packets, to the machine, the milk fother and EASY cleanup. I have an Italian wonder in my kitchen and people think Im a top tier espresso maker...its all Nespresso in reality...but....shhhhh...Ill take credit. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Every single pod is damaged. Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Every single pod is damaged. Some so much so that they don’t work in the machine. Never again. You got my money seller, good for you but never again.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Variety Pack for OriginalLine, 50.
customer_reviews.text: Better than other non Nespresso capsules. Quite pricey if you need 4-5 a day like me. The best to get top tasting and low pricing is to buy the empty capsules, grind your coffee and use them fresh. This what I've doing for the last few months. I use Jamaica blue mountain coffee beans which gives me the ultimate espresso shots at 15 cents each.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee as usual.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is the best in so many ways. Delivery was a little on the iffy side but as it turns out a neighbor picked it up because they knew that no one was home. They brought it over and now the coffee is being enjoyed. Sorry about that earlier review on the delivery problem. Everything is A OK now. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wingover

customer_reviews.title: Change. Your. Shipping practices. (Damaged pods (again))
customer_reviews.text: Most of the coffees are great. The main reason for this review is because, twice now, many of the pods have arrived damaged with no apparent damage to the packaging, albeit lackluster in and of itself. 8 pods were majorily damaged and about 10 others minorely so. The Nespresso machines are expensive therefore I wouldn't risk putting broken pods into them. Some disagree with reviewing in this manner. Personally, I aim to review the product I was given. Fact of the matter is, roughly 20% of the product arrived unuseable. Avoid USA Coffee until they have respect for the pods they ship.
customer_reviews.author: a.robo

customer_reviews.title: ... boxes were crushed up in the case bit Looks like it was packed that
customer_reviews.text: Coffee boxes were crushed up in the case bit Looks like it was packed that way
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanee

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Capsules are the BEST Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal for Nespresso Capsules! Other off-brands just don't measure up. I didn't buy a Nespresso to skimp on the quality of coffee I drink. That's why I bought one to begin with. This pack comes with a variety of capsules for your every need whether for a straight cup of espresso or with frothed milk for your favorite latte. I do t recommend any other capsules but these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great, capsules are damaged but not noticeable negatively impacting taste.
customer_reviews.text: Received the package in good condition. Unfortunatly upon opening the individual packs the capsules were dented. We’re surprised that everyone of the capsules were dented in one way or another? So strange considering the shipping box was not damaged nor the individual packaged boxes the capsules were damaged. Looks like the capsules were damaged prior to packaging? Not sure if they are “quality control” inspected at their factory or not? So far the capsules I have used did not seem to be negatively impacted by the damages? Espresso is consistent with the variety pack that came with my Nespresso machine. Will update if I find a noticeable difference?
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire Harm

customer_reviews.title: I should've listened to the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Usually I don't write about products unless they're exceedingly well-made/designed, but this review serves as a cautionary advisement to other consumers. This item needs to be FIXED. The pods are constructed from a thin layer of aluminum that doesn't always retain its original shape while under pressure, which will cause your espresso machine to let grounds leak through to the cup. It's highly frustrating given their expensive nature in the first place. The only reason I noticed is because 3/5 of the pods do not have this issue whereas two of them do. Thanks for 60% satisfaction at least..
customer_reviews.author: arianjalali

customer_reviews.title: Fastest place to order Nespresso capsules
customer_reviews.text: recently had to order them from nestle direct because the listing was down. Nespresso from amazon arrived before the Nestle direct ones did! Also throwing it out there since i've ordered these about 15 times now from amazon, i personally haven't had any of them crushed or defective. they come in their factory boxes, wrapped in a form fitting corrugated box(Nestle box) and put in a bubble wrap mailer if anyone is wondering..
customer_reviews.author: ThisGuyHere

customer_reviews.title: Good selection
customer_reviews.text: While the actual boxes with pods were completely intact, it is strange that almost all of the pods inside were damaged and dented. None of the pods was actually ripped open but majority appeared to be pressed and dented, and I had to trow few away already because they could not fit the machine properly because of damage. I think that seller, who is I believe Nespresso itself, should mention the defect in the product description. These are probably defects that they do not want to sell in their boutiques, and in that case, they should give a better discount rather than selling them for same price as the regular non-defected ones.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Ovcina

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if the price is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily coffee drinker. Now Working from home, I am getting lazy on brewing coffee with ground and starting to relying on the Nespresso machine. These offical pods are alright. They look better and perhaps smell better than the third party alternatives. However, they are also more than twice as expensive. I personally can't really tell much differences. I have bought some third party capsules as well and drink both back to back. Honestly can't tell much differences. The cheaper ones do provide the caffeine I need.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I drink 10-12 espressos each day. I’ve had every brand that is commercially available in America today. These capsules are not meant to be premium espresso; it’s not in that market. That said,This product is ok; it’s just average. It is not freshly ground espresso so I’m not taking points off for tasting canned. It’s just not a great flavor(none of the flavors). It tastes ok served hot; but is horrid iced. I threw it out. I tried three different flavors at different times iced and I conclude that it is simply not formulated for this. The hot flavor is 3 stars. Iced ,it’s negative 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: 5STAR

customer_reviews.title: Best of basic nespresso variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Glad that these flavors are all in one variety pack. If you are new to the espresso game and want something that is more traditional then these are great for beginners and the connoisseurs alike. My favorite of the bunch by itself is the arpeggio which has the perfect balance of boldness and flavor for an espresso while the darker types are great for the morning latte or cappuccino.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan L

customer_reviews.title: Great Collection for Coffee heads.
customer_reviews.text: Damn its a good coffee and a deal from a Amazon. Shipping was really fast and I don't have any issues whatsoever. Works perfectly for me. Coffee tastes Good and even though we are paying .74 for a pod It really worth the spending. would definilty recommend to all coffee heads LOL Its the best collection of coffee if you like to have strong coffee taste. Shipped in very good condition. Quality is unparallel. Must give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JnS

customer_reviews.title: more strong
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I think Nespresso is very rigorous and attentive to the research and development of products under Nespresso brand. The taste design of both machines and capsules is not to fool the public who do not understand coffee, but to feel its professionalism and seriousness. Given its tremendous convenience,like it . Although some of the capsules are very similar or not very different, there are more distinct flavors, including acidity, bitterness, thickness, aftertaste and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Coco

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during manufacturing, not shipping
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in pristine condition. A good number of capsules had dents. This was not due to shipping as box and Nespresso packaging was in pristine condition. Pretty disappointing for a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: bigmrv7

customer_reviews.title: You Cannot Beat the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I have re-ordered this product several times. I love the assortment and keep the capsules in a tray I also ordered from Amazon. TIP: I find that I can run the water through one capsule two times to get more coffee without it diluting the flavor. I stir in some collagen powder, a little MCT brain oil, and some frothed coconut milk and I have a delicious, sugar free start to my day.
customer_reviews.author: BelleVieBeth

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not descriptive, not flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Pods were OK, overpriced. Bought them because I received a coffee pod maker, and I had guests. But, the whole idea of the cups is rather wasteful. The coffee itself was not very tasty, but you could tell that there was variety between the packs. The bolder flavors were the best. But, they are named in a way with no product description...so I had to Google what each kind was and write reminders on the box. Super luxe packaging. And you can recycle the Nescafe cups at Nescafe and Sur La Table stores.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: Capsules came squished and a few busted open.
customer_reviews.text: About half of the capsules came damaged (it appears that the sleeves were damaged before they were put in the cardboard delivery box). I had to bend the edges with a dull end of a knife to fix them. I only hope they don't damage my Nespresso machine. About 3 capsules were busted open and the fine espresso powder made a huge mess. I'm going to keep them, but I had to throw a few away and I'd like to at least get some of my money back or more capsules that aren't damaged please.
customer_reviews.author: omgthecourt

customer_reviews.title: Is the coffee good, or the machine?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the pods are good, or the machine is, but I'm getting a good espresso with the combo. I do wish the coffee were cheaper. I've not tried other/cheaper brands. If/when I do, should I find one that is as good but cheaper, I'll come back here and ding the Nespresso a star because of price. But as it stands, I'm getting a good shot for 70 cents or so, and the lowest hassle for any espresso solution, so I'm giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: sudonym

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, and a good selection for a variety pack.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition, and each variety tasted great. Far better than some off-brand pods I've used, but also more expensive. If you find these to be too expensive, check out some of the higher-rated off-brand pods and see if you can overlook the lesser taste for cheaper cappuccinos. Ristretto is kinda my "norm" pod, but I'm glad I gave the variety pack a try. I might go with Arpeggio in the future, but I liked how the wider variety of options was more stimulating since I couldn't remember all the flavor profiles.
customer_reviews.author: Facelord

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety Set
customer_reviews.text: These are the actual Nespresso pods. We tried an alternative brand that was cheaper and were really disappointed. There's just no substituted for the genuine article. The mix is great for it's variety. If you're new to Nespresso, this is a nice mix with no decaf pods mixed in (which I think are a waste for most coffee drinkers). The price here at Amazon is the same as the Nespresso site (at least currently it is) but the free (and fast) shipping has us buy here. I was really happy to find them available here!
customer_reviews.author: CuriousAndCozyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dented capsules???
customer_reviews.text: So I've ordered them several times and the only thing I can say is they come in dented - but the boxes are fine. It's like they're the rejects that couldn't be sold direct from Nespresso or their boutiques. If that's the case, they should mark it as such and let the consumer decide. But, "new" indicates the same I can get in the Nespresso Store or from them directly. Having purchased from the stores both in the US and Europe and never had dented capsules; so I see no reason these should be dented. No issues other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time this has occurred- the pods were not properly packaged and were damaged upon arrival. Because they are damaged, they will not fit in the nespresso machine and are therefor useless. I’ve wasted $38 dollars and will not be ordering nespresso pods from amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Espresso Just Wish More Sustainable
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee enthusiast and I did a TON of research before buying a nespresso machine and these specific pods. I would buy these again as ive tried a few of the off brands from target and theyve been hit or miss. The nespresso pods delivered the best. I just wish these things could be more sustainable / earth friendly and not made from aluminum (not a fan of using high heat on aluminun for health reasons). Have yet to find a solid reusable option for nespresso thats not really time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these for the past few years and not had an issue. This batch has me beside myself/ The pods have been bent and crushed. I have tried to straighten them out and successful in about 1 in 5. Not what you want to do 1st thing in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda A.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Damage
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee!! Husband and I fell in love at first try. The only reason for my 3 stars is the fact that a significant portion of the pods were damaged and unusable, effectively depreciating its value. I read some reviewers mentioned this issue in their reviews but thought I’d give it a try anyway. The first time I ordered it, they came in perfect condition (not a single damaged pod) but my second order was not so lucky. About 10-15 pods were completely not usable and a few had to be manually reshaped to even work in the machine. I now have to search for a new source for my Nespresso pods.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Soye

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, rich espresso in different flavors.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, this is the best brand I've tasted, every bit as good as espresso made by a skilled barista. My husband and I recently returned from a trip to Eastern Europe where we were totally spoiled by the coffee experience there, and returned to the USA wanting to reproduce it at home. Nespresso has helped keep our European memories alive every day with their excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHEN ONLY THE BEST COFFEE WILL DO
customer_reviews.text: blind taste test results: none of the lesser brands compare.... Annie and i can tell instantly if it is nespresso or a knock off... worth the money if you love coffee... better than Starbucks..... Terry Hunefeld and Ann Dunham, San Diego
customer_reviews.author: thunefeld

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, delicious
customer_reviews.text: We have a Nespresso machine at the office, and I got so spoiled by it, we had to get one for our home. I've ordered these Nespresso pods several times, and they are always smooth, delicious, and come in great condition. I've seen other reviews about broken or dented boxes or pods, but that's never happened to me. The amount of pods also perfectly fits in the storage drawer I have under my Nespresso maker, which is convenient!
customer_reviews.author: SDTraveler01

customer_reviews.title: Fits the older Pixie Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say for these. They are the original Nespresso pods. All caffeinated and exactly what I needed. Hard to find in the store so Amazon it is. There are 5 different "flavors" or blends/roasts of coffee in this package. Its a good price for 50 pods. Much cheaper than going to the Coffee shop and getting a fresh one from a barista.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jordan K

customer_reviews.title: Should I expect future deliveries to arrive damaged as well?
customer_reviews.text: I rely on this company to provide me with the lowest priced Nespresso capsules to satisfy my caffeine addiction without cleaning out my pockets. However, this recent order arrived with absolutely EVERY SINGLE CAPSULE damaged with dents. I gotta assume they can sell at a low price because they're buying up damaged factory seconds, except that this was the first time any of the capsules were less than perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldogy

customer_reviews.title: The different blends were good and it was nice to taste them all
customer_reviews.text: The different blends were good and it was nice to taste them all. I was a fool and bought these without really thinking that it might not fit my nespresso. Well I have the vertuoline line, apparently this does not fit lol So I ended up wasting my money on the wrong nespresso pods. you would think that when it says "nespresso" that it would fit all the nespresso machines...nope. But I was just mis-informed. :/ the coffee was still good.
customer_reviews.author: Camille L

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order that’s dented and won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Received a bunch of dented pods. Last time, more than half did not work in the machine because the shape was altered enough it couldn’t puncture them properly. This is the second order from JPI (jagged Peak Inc in St. Petersburg, FL) that was like this. The order I received today has 25!!! Dented pods. (See pic)
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Well you get what you paid for. We tried different knock off brands on amazon...Almost broke our machine, and you are not saving money anyways. The knock off brands Foil is so much thicker, machine couldn’t punch through completely, ended up you are getting half of the cup, so basically you pay half the price and get half of the cup! lol Buy cheap buy twice, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas mimi

customer_reviews.title: Need these on auto delivery
customer_reviews.text: We usually grab our Nespresso pods from Nespresso directly but they are currently experiencing high order volumes and these ones shipped right away. We like all these flavors although the Bronze one is my favorite. I wish these could be on auto delivery because they're lasting just over a week with 2 of us home and having 2 of these a day.
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I placed the order on 9/9/2017 and just found the Expire day is 4/30/2017! That’s ridiculous!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of my capsules are bent/ dented.
customer_reviews.text: Why are so many coffee capsules bent, crushed or dented? The sleeves the capsules come in are intact, which is what I don't understand. Now I'm wondering where the coffee capsules actually come from? Are they safe to consume? Will they even perform inside the machine when one side of the capsule is bent?
customer_reviews.author: MissMonaLisa2

customer_reviews.title: This pack contains bitter coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this is not my favorite mix of flavors, this particular combination has a lot of bitter flavors, but if you like your coffee bitter, this one is for you. I cannot say enough about Nespresso, the beyond easy clean up, the overall taste of the coffee, it truly is a dream! But I will be ordering a different variety pack if available next time. I love a variety pack, but my old variety didn't seem to be available any more, so I tried this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Litvin

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso is the best, so please improve your packaging
customer_reviews.text: This Nespresso variety pack of original capsules tastes so good. I also bought a different brand along with this order and it tasted so bad I can't even drink them. Nespresso brand espresso wins hands down. I guess you get what you pay for. One star off because every capsule was dented. Not super bad damage, but if you are going to make us pay more, at least give us better packaging!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was nervous to buy these because of so many negative reviews about capsule damage. I took a chance and ordered them, and I’m so glad I did. Box was actually a Nespresso box, not amazon, and they arrived quickly. Box was marked as fragile and arrived without any damage. My receipt inside the box said it was from a Nespresso authorized reseller. All 5 individual espresso flavor boxes were in perfect condition, as were the pods inside. Not sure if I got lucky, but I have no complaints. Will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Move over Starbucks!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this coffee. Fantastic value pack with a variety of flavors and espresso strengths. Easy-to-use pods with the Nespresso machine. I also frequently use the pods twice in a row, finding that they still have plenty of flavor for a second brewing if used immediately. I will definitely repurchase and would rather grab a cup at home with one of these pods than visit Starbucks any day! Definitely would recommend trying!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Delicious for shots of espresso
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for making espresso at home. Ignore the reviews of people saying they taste burnt or bitter, they don't know what good espresso tastes like. Like with any shot of espresso, you need to drink it within a few seconds of being poured or yes it, will become more bitter if it sits. Also, didn't have any issues with smashed or dented pods. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roboto

customer_reviews.title: Smooth with a Punch !
customer_reviews.text: These came with my espresso machine and we thought they tasted amazing. When we ran out my husband bought me Starbucks brand but we both actually like this brand better . It’s bold yet smooth and packs quite the punch . We are up all night with twins and these pods make my 3 am wake up call a breeze !
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ebbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso and/or Cappuccino
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price on a Nespresso Machine via an auction. Watched tutorials via the internet on the machine to make certain I understood how it worked. Love the machine. Was concerned after reading some of the reviews of purchasing off-brand coffee pods, so my first order was Nespresso. Great coffee, but intense flavor, which is how espresso and/or cappuccino is supposed to be made. I only make cappuccino for me, but love the experience so far. I have not tried the intense 10 and 9 level yet, but I decided I would use cream instead of milk with the more intense flavors. Worth the price and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Nespresso Variety
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flavorful combo ... they are ALL good!! Some more mild than the others but I've used the stronger capsules to make a lungo, just press it twice!! Only wish these suckers were a little less expensive, still can't beat the convenience and taste for an 'at home' cup!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnFYI

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Caps, undamaged!!!! And amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on the reviews. SO HAPPY I did! My package was delivered undamaged, and securely packaged. What a relief. There was a small dent in one pod but my machine accepted it. Taste is amazing and I will order again!!! Maybe I got lucky? I took pictures of everything so you could see. One recommendation I would have is to put fragile on the box?! Maybe they will be delivered more effectively, who knows. Worth a try! If you’re hesitant, maybe call ahead and have it sent to a pick up location. I feel like most products are damaged during transport because the packaging was on point!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rach3lrae

customer_reviews.title: Sadly too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: Too good to be true on pricing. :( I ignored the bad reviews and lo and behold... Packaging was undamaged, even the boxes holding the nespresso capsules was undamaged but somehow the pods have dents in them?!! It'll still work in my machine but won't puncture nearly as many holes, leading to a watery watery espresso.
customer_reviews.author: janewin

customer_reviews.title: Personal taste like some more than others
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to do I bought it as a sample pack to see which ones I might like and summer better than others they all seem relatively fresh and I think they make a better Americano than they do an espresso in my Wacaco nanopresso for Nespresso capsule which is a hand press not a big machine!
customer_reviews.author: Kinghazzah

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: We can only use these coffee pods in our espresso machine, and thankfully they're really good. Lots of variety, and they make homemade lattes fun! Not a terrible price either. There was one time we didn't receive our order, and they immediately refunded us and shipped a new one for free.
customer_reviews.author: TrippNessa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate - buy it ☕️
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the little extra money for Nespresso pods. Delivery was fast product was in excellent condition. Taste is amazing. Why did I wait so long to buy a Nespresso machine. Never going back to drip coffee. All pods were in excellent condition no dents etc... Now the hard part picking a favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw out
customer_reviews.text: For a new Nespresso user the pods were not easily identified while searching. I did search Nespresso Pods and these came up so I purchased them. I received the package and instantly knew the sleeve was way to small to be the correct size I needed. I didn’t open them at all but was advised I cannot return them and I cannot take them to a Nespresso boutique un opened and exchange for he correct pod size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee and average pricing
customer_reviews.text: We have always been a big lover of Nespresso coffee. Have has our machine for 3 years now. When ordering online you must be aware of the fresh date. If not stated try to avoid. We trust Amazon products and this being the first time ordering from an Amazon provider we were somewhat curious about the quality control. All was good and we will order more. Pricing is the same as going to an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All dented, but usable . . .
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when I got these because packaging looked brand new. Once I opened each sleeve, every single pod was dented up. All of them seem to be usable, and taste great . . . will not purchase again though, not sure what is going with the repackaging of damaged pods?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: malsmom

customer_reviews.title: Dented, damaged pods
customer_reviews.text: Wasted a few since they were damaged.. and each pod is worth $.70 ... :/ I want my money back for the unusable ones!
customer_reviews.author: Blunty Khloe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy. Ever. Dirty aftertaste. Buy straight from Nespresso instead.
customer_reviews.text: These capsules came damaged and stink. The aroma of the coffee is of an armpit and it tastes gross. I never noticed with other orders but this one was too bad to ignore - save yourself the trouble and order from nespresso’s website.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Deeeelicious!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for sure and many delicious flavours. Remember to shake each individual capsule before putting it in the machine As I realised the grains are “stuck” together and I had to run them twice to get the coffee out. But yeah aside from that it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mixed pack
customer_reviews.text: I take my coffee black and these are among my favorite pods from Nespresso. Good range on the stronger side but these are not too dark and don't taste burnt. The lungos are smoother and a nice change up. If you are buying a lot of coffee then I recommend taking advantage of Nespresso's free gifts when you order from their site or app.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: No returns
customer_reviews.text: Can not review it as good or bad, but be careful buying. I am a first time user of this product and bought it by mistake to a different model, but no returns are excepted. My mistake I understand, but in description it was next to a machine I bought. Just be careful
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: I cannot go a day without my Nespresso coffee.
customer_reviews.text: For a fraction of Starbucks coffee, I get to enjoy my coffee at home and not spend sooo much money. It tastes very good and always fresh. I can't remember the last time I had to go out for coffee. I am very happy with my nespresso and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good Assortment
customer_reviews.text: Since we started with the Nespresso in our office, we can't go back to regular coffee. The Nespresso is rich and has a subtle boldness that draws you in makes you want more. Unfortunately, the 50 pack doesn't last long enough. We have tried the capsules that Target sells but they were a bit lacking in the flavor so, stick with the Nespresso capsules. Shipping from Amazon has been fine, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Reno Vader

customer_reviews.title: My favs are..
customer_reviews.text: So I got this as my first run, with my new Nespresso machine... My favorite us Purple. My second with a much darker vibe, the black one. Honesty they're all great. My least fav is the green but I don't hate it! I say this is a perfect purchase to see what flavors you like.. *make sure you get the recycling kit from Nespresso *Paid shipping to recycle
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Ive Not Found A Replacement That Competes With Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: I have probably tried all of the competitors brands out there and although they are usually a better price most of them do not distribute the coffee correctly. Their coffee is also inferior to Nespresso Brand. I have had my machine for over 5 years so I am not new to drinking their coffee. I would suggest to sticking with the Nespresso brand and spending a little more for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: great way to buy pods
customer_reviews.text: i bought pods from amazon because the nespresso site has backed up shipping. i saw a few reviews that some pods were dented, which was true but really had no impact on the ability to make a nice shot of espresso. nothing was dented to a point where it couldn't be used. i appreciate the variety in this pack, great to have options for different people or just figure out what you like.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lee

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few brands of pods for the Nespresso machine, and these are some of the better ones. They are a little pricey in terms of cost per cup, but the taste is good. Some of the flavors in this mix I'm not a fan of, but my husband seems to enjoy them. Worth noting that Nespresso has started recycling there pods, but you need to include a note with your order that you'd like a return mailer. I've never tried this, but I think you have to go through Nespresso's website to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Epley

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: You could easily spend $35 in a week buying espresso. This is a good quality coffee, and so easy! Lots of yummy crema. I love the Arpeggio! It’s so nice to be able to make an espresso in less than five minutes. Save those pods! They do recycle unlike the ones that are plastic crap and shall not be named. None of mine were dented, all perfectly happy in their little sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Clawsalot

customer_reviews.title: Here's what comes in this box set.
customer_reviews.text: The copper color is what comes in these. I couldn't tell if the color was copper or brighter golden color. I liked the copper flavor and not the golden color flavor in the sample case that came with my machine. Glad that's what came in this refill box. I've tried every flavor that comes in this arrangement. I liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman TimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Blah blah blah
customer_reviews.text: It’s just bougie coffee, all you low ratings make a fuss over nothing. It’s good quality product it’s delicious with foamed milk, let the low rater keep getting pimped at the local coffee shops. A man needs a pinky ring to drink this stuff, while the ladies sip and point their pinkies out. Thank you, and not one of mine were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: Do not work in Nespresso Coffee Machine
customer_reviews.text: The capsules do not work in the Nespresso machine which the company stated they would. I have now wasted my money because you can't return them....which was not stated in the purchase. I was told this when I tried to return them. I thought prime meant they guaranteed the product. Horrible service.
customer_reviews.author: susan scott

customer_reviews.title: NOT vertuoline Compatible!
customer_reviews.text: Being a nespresso newbie I ordered these by mistake... they are NOT compatible with the vertuoline series nespresso's and are NOT returnable. They probably taste and work great, but this is more of a disappointment on the ability to return/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Could not leave without my Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee. I have a small Nespresso machine which was given to me as a gift so these little pods are great. They come in different strength of coffee and I like to buy a mixture of them, from light to strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Like the combo pack but DO wish there were more 10’s and 9’s and fewer 5,6’s
customer_reviews.author: LiveLoveHula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent selection of complementary coffee flavors at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I use these pods in my Nespresso Pixie espresso machine. Excellent selection of complementary coffee flavors at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: rets38mot

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor.
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these a few years. Definitely worth the price. Flavor is great, and the pods are recyclable if you send it to Nespresso. They'll send you a bag to fill, and you can send it back to them for free.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz + Michael

customer_reviews.title: A really great variety pack
customer_reviews.text: A really great variety pack. Each capsule is nicely packaged in it's sleeve, with a nice description of the notes of each flavor in a variety of languages. I enjoy the variety of intensities- some days you want something a little lighter, some days you wanna get punched in the face by boldness. I feel like this is a great value as well, and I'll definitely renew my order when I'm just about done.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Plyler

customer_reviews.title: every single capsule dented
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Nespresso products. This was my first time buying capsules through Amazon and I'm very disappointed. I've read several reviews about dented capsules but didn't take it seriously. However, for my disbelieve, all capsules received are coming out of the box dented, yet the box has no signs of wear and tear. Some reviews say it doesn't affect the coffee experience overall nor the machine, but in my case I already had to discard a few brews because the coffee came out with some of the ground coffee that is inside of the capsule.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Packed poorly for shipping
customer_reviews.text: Every single pod i got is damaged. From each of the 5 boxes i have to throw away 2 or 3 pods due to being too crushed to use. Most have small dents like they were dropped on a floor. My new unit is not too picky about them but some older Nespressos cant even use the pods with minor dents. I dont know if its Amazon or Nespresso but this is a little ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: ( ﾟ▽ﾟ)

customer_reviews.title: I’ve ordered this product numerous times, but this last ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product numerous times, but this last shipment, the package was badly damaged and left several pods unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Lagresa

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While I am more used to use the standard espresso machines while working as a barista, I got a Nespresso for Xmas and enjoy using it. It's ideal for quick lattes that still taste good. I like most of the flavors of these Nespresso pods, but can't go above 4 stars because I've actually seen this sold for cheaper. But it's a good purchase especially if you can get free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: We received Nespresso coffee machine as my husband’s birthday gift and purchased these capsules for the second time. They came with different colors which is luxurious looking but I wish they also had written the level of coffee on the capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEEE-LICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love Nespresso coffee. I use both the Cittiz and the Vertuoline machines. The flavor is terrific and the pods are a convenient size. Pods are just very expensive, so there's that. But if you love great coffee, you will pay for the pods.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented, mangled and cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: SO like most reviewers here I got these in good packing but dented inside. This affects the way they do in the machine. I find the taste is alright but I doubt if I will buy them again. I dont know if its possible but these could be QA rejects from factory pods, just repackaged and sold here
customer_reviews.author: Neel

customer_reviews.title: Taste great but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and myself as a holiday gift. Nespresso can be a bit pricey compared to other home cafe products but it is worth the splurge during special times of year. I loved the variety pack and as we can make different flavors and switch it up from day to day.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Always great quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the coffee is what you expect from Nespresso, a perfect shot of espresso every time. I’ve tried the off brand pods and they just don’t hold up to Nespresso. Also these are not made with plastic, meaning they can be recycled and are better for our planet than the cheap plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Curry

customer_reviews.title: No damage when delivered!
customer_reviews.text: 1-5-2019 I was worried from other reviews that the capsules would arrive damaged but all of mine are perfect. No dents or damage. Very well packaged. Fast 2 day shipping came just in time! I didn’t have to miss a cup of coffee. At 70 cents per cup of coffee-its well worth the price! Once you go Nespresso-you can’t go back!
customer_reviews.author: B customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicioso!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed every one of these varieties. I can't break down the difference between them yet, but know that they are all good. It doesn't seem like Nespresso makes any coffee that is not pleasant to drink. This is also a good deal - much cheaper than buying from Nespresso, unless you buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: SloaneChic

customer_reviews.title: Use these over any other form of coffee
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed with these. We have four coffee machines in our kitchen but this is the only one we use daily. The pods are delicious and come in a wide variety of flavors. And I love how you can pick what intensity you need at that time. Very easy and fast to use. Yes the price is a little high for some tiny capsules, but, again, we pretty much ignore our other machines? so to us it’s worth the cost. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Mundzik

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is the key
customer_reviews.text: Brand consistency we recently ordered directly from NESPRESSO and they lost our order I had to chase them down for a resolution. Will never order from NESPRESSO even though I love their coffee. Hats off for prompt accurate order.
customer_reviews.author: M.Suer

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty selection of 5 basic varieties. Good value too. You can recycle the pellets by asking Nespresso for a free bag to drop off at any UPS store with free prepaid shipping. Very green!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor No

customer_reviews.title: NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the same time I bought a Nespresso machine. I decided not to keep the machine, so these are useless. Although they are still in the original shipping packaging, completely unopened, they are not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective box otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these several times and this is the first time I’ve gotten almost an entire box of bent pods. Idk how they made it through production and in the box like this. Even if I straighten them out, they don’t work for whatever reason. Just send the box back immediately if you get ones that look like this. Otherwise the coffee and flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules OriginalLine,Ispirazione Best Seller Variety Pack, Medium & Dark Roast Espresso Coffee, 50 Count Espresso Coffee Pods, Brews 1.35oz
product_meta.description: Style:Capsules OriginalLineCONTENTS: ISPIRAZIONE ROMA: A full and balanced coffee blend. Intensity 8. A fusion of Arabica Beans from South and Central America combined with Robusta CAPRICCIO: A rich and distinctive coffee blend. Intensity 5. A fusion of Arabica Beans from South America combined with Robusta ISPIRAZIONE GENOVA LIVANTO: A round and balanced coffee blend. Intensity 6. 100% Arabica- South and Central America Beans ISPIRAZIONE FIRENZE ARPEGGIO: A intense and creamy coffee blend. Intensity 9. 100% Arabica- South and Central America Beans ISPIRAZIONE RISTRETTO ITALIANO: A powerful and contrasting coffee blend. Intensity 10. A fusion of Arabica Beans from South America combined with Robusta
feature_bullets: NEW LOOK, NEW NAME, SAME GREAT TASTE: This Nespresso OriginalLine espresso coffee pod pack contains best-selling Nespresso capsules (10 each) Capriccio, Ispirazione Roma, Ispirazione Genova Livanto, Ispirazione Firenze Arpeggio, Ispirazione Ristretto

INTENSITY: Explore the rich tastes of the following Nespresso Capsules Capriccio (Intensity 5), Ispirazione Roma (Intensity 8), Ispirazione Genova Livanto (Intensity 6), Ispirazione Firenze Arpeggio (Intensity 9), Ispirazione Ristretto (Intensity 10)
ESPRESSO BREWS 1.35 OZ: These Nespresso OriginalLine pods are part of the flavored range that will provide you with a 1.35 oz serving of a delicious coffee beverage

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

ORIGINALLINE ONLY: Nespresso Original Line offers a full range of espresso coffee. From a milder fruity espresso to the short Ristretto. Create recipes with /without milk. (Nespresso OriginalLine capsules are not compatible with VertuoLine machines)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
